title: México (Imperatriz do)
body:
Empress Carlota visited Madeira, accompanied by her husband Emperor Maximilian, in April 1864, while en route to Mexico aboard the Novara, having spent some time on this island a few years earlier, when she arrived in December 1859, accompanied by her husband.

As Cesar Cantu mentions in *Ultimos trinta anos*, Empress Carlota wrote a work entitled *Um inverno na Madeira*.

See also Maximilian (Emperor of Mexico).

1864: Visit of Empress Carlota and Emperor Maximilian to Madeira
